original_title: Doomed! The Untold Story of Roger Corman's The Fantastic Four
overview: A history of the ill-fated 1994 production of “The Fantastic Four” that was executive produced by Roger Corman.
tagline: How many movies did Roger Corman make that never got released? One.
title: Doomed! The Untold Story of Roger Corman's The Fantastic Four
